text: Raffaele Pisu (24 May 1925 â€“ 31 July 2019)E' morto Raffaele Pisu was an Italian actor and comedian. In 2005, Pisu won the Nastro d'Argento for best supporting actor for his role in Paolo Sorrentino's The Consequences of Love. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian comedians Category:People from Bologna
